generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including yellow lines and a large white arrow, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by curbs and occupied by pedestrians and parked motorcycles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and along the sides of the street, including commercial structures with storefronts and residential buildings with windows and balconies.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles, standing vertically along the sidewalk and street.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are clearly visible at the intersection, indicating that traffic should stop.
- traffic sign: A red circular traffic sign with a white horizontal bar (indicating "no entry" or "do not enter") is visible on a pole on the right side of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible along the sidewalk, particularly on the right side of the image.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, standing or walking near the traffic lights and storefronts.
- motorcycle: Multiple motorcycles and scooters are parked on the right side of the sidewalk, with their wheels and bodies clearly visible.
- bicycle: A bicycle is partially visible on the right side of the image, parked next to the motorcycles.
- bus: A large public transport bus, marked with the number 2038, is prominently visible on the left side of the image, occupying a significant portion of the frame.
- train: The bus on the left side of the image is a tram, which is a type of train that runs on rails in urban areas.
- car: The front part of a car, including the Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood, is visible at the bottom center of the image, indicating the perspective is from inside a car.
